entry.title: Migrating away from Blogger.com
entry.summary:
I’ve been underground since the beginning of the month and haven’t been working on any new posts. I have several new topics in the pipeline but I’ve been focusing on two projects that are keeping me away from my blog at the moment.

entry.title: Migrating from Blogger.com: Setting up Subtext
entry.summary:
I’m really liking Subtext, so far I’m not regretting my choice to use it as my blog engine. It has been pretty simple to setup and there has been plenty of support from the community in the form of blog posts describing everything I’ve needed.
